Package javelin.controller.action

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ActionDescription
    Describes an action.
    SimpleAction
    Basic description for an action that can be used both in and out of battle.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Action
    One of the game moves, to be used during battle.
    ActionAdapter
    Used to create an in-battle Action from a WorldAction.
    ActionMapping
    Basic listing of in-game Actions.
    Breath
    Use breath attack.
    CastSpell
    Spells with attack rolls are supposed to have critical hits too but for the sake of AI speed this rule is ignored.
    Charge
    TODO still needs to add prerequisites such as 10feet minimum and 2x speed maximum.
    DiagonalMovement
    TODO can't move diagonally through a corner
    Fire
    Ranged attack.
    Help
    Shows keyboard commands.
    Movement  
    PassItem
    Hands item over to a friendly unit.
    TouchAttack
    An attack that reaches out only 5 feet, like from the Digester or Shocker Lizard.
    UseItem  
    Wait
    Technically it's the action Full Defense because it gives a bonus to AC (see Defending but w is a better keyboard shortcut for it.
